Content.Title: Quick Description

Images.Alt: Picture of the GameJam Playthrough Manager program.

Text: The GameJam Playthrough Manager program is a program that allows you to easily manage which games you have played in a gamejam playthrough! It also will help you manage requests and deleteted entries.

Content.Title: Create New

Images.Alt: Picture of the new playthrough menu.

Text: This menu Is where you create a new playthrough. Here you can name it and set the # of the first and last games in the playthrough. The manager will automatically add every game # in between to your playthrough list!
